name: NSFileProviderServiceSource
desc: A service that provides a custom communication channel between the host app and the File Provider extension.

items.name: var serviceName: NSFileProviderServiceName
items.desc: A name that uniquely identifies the service (reverse domain name notation is recommended).

items.name: func makeListenerEndpoint() -> NSXPCListenerEndpoint
items.desc: Returns an endpoint object that lets the host app communicate with the File Provider extension.
